series_description: This series documents annual reporting by permittees of water, gas, and oil production, abandoned wells that are not producing, and the price of oil per barrel and gas per cubic square feet. This series may include, but is not limited to, annual reports
This series documents the division's response to complaints and incidents that have occurred on permitted sites. This series may include, but is not limited to, reports.
This series documents statistics for gas production, escrow funds dispersed, permits, and violations. This series may include, but is not limited to, reports.
This series documents maps and map data received and developed by the Division for reference purposes and daily actions. This series may include, but is not limited to, submitted maps and GIS data.
This series documents monthly production of gas and oil producers. This series may include, but is not limited to, reports.
This series documents the registration of gas and oil drillers, owners, explorers, transporters and agents. This series may include, but is not limited to, registration forms.

series_title: Virginia Gas and Oil Board Records
series_description: This series documents the official actions of the Virginia Gas and Oil Board. This series may include, but is not limited to, applications, dockets, and support documentation.

This series documents the issuance of permits prior to starting gas and oil operations. This series may include, but is not limited to: applications, permits, final inspection reports, location and pipeline maps, and supporting documentation.
This series documents security bond filings by gas or oil permittees prior to starting operations. This series may include, but is not limited to, bonds

This series documents investigations to understand and analyze land structure, resources, and potential hazards of the location of wells. This series may include, but is not limited to, geological and geophysical logs and surveys
